reviewText: boring - a friend gave me this - it's alright but pretty monotonous - I wouldn't recommend it
I have been buying the Doseage Series in reverse. This one is not as polished as the later two, but still a great video. It has all the usual suspects and great climbing.

The first dose, deep water soloing in Vietnam's Ha Long Bay, is reason enough to buy this DVD.  All six doses are cool and range from inspired or inspiring climbing with Sharma, Graham, Caldwell, Rodden, Kiehl and others. Ron Kauk provides an intimate and introspective look at climbing on what it has meant to him.  Of the three Dosage videos, this is by far the favorite of me and my buddies.
